data.message: This is a wonderful idea that can help people with visual impairments at least get a description of the photo by using advancements in object recognition technology; It's nice to help people who have disabilities feel like they belong.

replies.message: We certainly agree, Tobi. Here's to belonging! -Abby
Facebook Keep up the good work.
This is great. Thank you from here

What a great start. Now if the picture explains that the bright white light streams through the large shiny green leaves while dew droplets catch and glisten a soft yellow light to draw a more complete picture or the six people consist of 3 redheads one infant  etc
Love this it will help many
We have several visually impaired family members and some friends who are too. Thank you for improving their participation in Facebook. Means a lot to all of us.
Does Facebook offer an option for text to be read orally to those who are visually paired? Speech to text is a typing option, but is there a text to speech option?
For once Facebook is doing something good!!!

I know many who are Visually Impaired.  We would like them to be able to make all fonts, prints etc. large print so they can read everything without straining there eyes/VISION. NOT EVERYTHING ON FB CAN BE MADE LARGER TO SEE OR READ??  WHEN CAN YOU IMPROVE THIS PLEASE?  THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR THESE IMPROVEMENTS.
iPhones and samsungs have text to speech built into the phones, making Facebook accessible
Facebook home can I do it for my daughter ?
This is wonderful, because I'm starting to loss my vision.  How do I install this new Facebook feature?
